author: UltPanda
description: A One Piece battle simulation cog for Discord.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including their fighting style, devil fruit, haki levels, doriki, bounty, battles won, last training time, and stamina.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the One Piece Battle cog! Use `.op begin` to start your journey!
name: OnePieceBattle
